articles.description: Eintracht Frankfurt striker Hugo Ekitike's arrival is set to take Liverpool's summer spending past £250m.
articles.title: Hugo Ekitike: Liverpool agree £69m fee for Eintracht Frankfurt striker

articles.description: All the latest transfer news as Marcus Rashford closes in on a move to Barcelona, plus Mikel Arteta speaks on prospective signing Viktor Gyokeres.
articles.title: Transfer news: Rashford, Ferguson latest plus Arteta on Gyokeres

articles.description: Manager Mikel Arteta says Arsenal followed the right processes when dealing with former midfielder Thomas Partey, who played while under police investigation for multiple counts of rape.
articles.title: Thomas Partey: Mikel Arteta '100%' sure Arsenal followed right processes

articles.description: Steve Tandy is appointed Wales men's head coach and will lead the side into the 2027 World Cup in Australia.
articles.title: Steve Tandy: Wales appoint Scotland defence coach as head coach

articles.description: Owen Farrell will make his first start of the tour in the British and Irish Lions' final midweek game against a First Nations and Pasifika XV on Tuesday.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions: Owen Farrell to captain against First Nations & Pasifika XV

articles.description: Scottie Scheffler is head and shoulders the best player in the world, but Rory McIlroy does not need to look far for motivation, says Iain Carter.
articles.title: The Open 2025: 'Toppling Scottie Scheffler becomes next objective for Rory McIlroy'

articles.description: Manchester United give permission for Marcus Rashford to complete a loan move to Spanish giants Barcelona.
articles.title: Marcus Rashford in Barcelona to complete loan move from Manchester United

articles.description: With a vice-like grip on the game, Scottie Scheffler's Open victory shows how he has become the most dominant men's golfer since Tiger Woods.
articles.title: The Open 2025: How Scottie Scheffler has become the world's most dominant golfer since Tiger Woods

articles.description: The life of former England batter Graham Thorpe will be celebrated during the fifth Test against India at The Oval.
articles.title: Graham Thorpe: Life to be celebrated during fifth England-India Test

articles.description: Mikel Arteta is not ruling out bringing more new signings on Arsenal's pre-season tour as negotiations for striker Viktor Gyokoeres continue.
articles.title: Mikel Arteta does not rule out more signings for Arsenal - 'we are still short'
